text:
@HillaryClinton Rajoelina had over the weekend claimed that the WHO offered his country the sum of $20m as a bribe to poison COVID-19 alleged cure. 👈 Hildabeast, are you behind this?? #LockHerUp #HillaryForPrison
https://t.co/acraZusCMO
